Project Description

This project contains code that I've placed on my blog at http://blogs.msdn.com/rwlodarc.

Project includes:

  • Converting WPF BitmapSource to/from GDI+ Bitmap
  • Walking metadata using WPF Imaging classes
  • Using WPF InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter
